DOC.brief_title: A Novel Prosocial Online Support Group Distressed Breast Cancer Survivors
DOC.detailed_description: Psychological distress significant problem among breast cancer survivor . Many survivor turn internet information support , yet control study examine effectiveness safety online support group . The investigator test potential efficacy , acceptability , feasibility innovative theory-based online support group ( OSG ) breast cancer survivor . Members control group participate standard OSG encourage self-expression . Members experimental condition participate prosocial OSG provide structured help opportunity coach best give support others . Participants complete two telephone interview six weekly online support group meeting .
DOC.criteria: diagnosed stage I II breast cancer precede 36 month 2164 year age access ability use computer internet communicate others fluent spoken English meet screen criterion psychological distress ( score > 7 either depression anxiety subscale Hospital Anxiety Depression Scales currently take medication depression
